name: Soul-Engines
description:
History:

In a post-apocalyptic world mankind bound their souls to cars to stay alive. But now the ones remaining fight over the scarce resources left.

Gather oil to keep your soul living. Gather scrap to improve your body. Beware! Everyone wants to survive.

Stay alive as long as posible in this Survival-Racing game as you fight over resources day and night.

Controls:

W - Accelerate

S - Break

A/D - Steer

Spacebar - For the Handbreak.

E - Gather resources

R - Upgrade car.

Alt + F4 - Quit.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 41. The theme was: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Authors: Alexis Salomon - Ariel Galiano.
